text:
Hello!

I have a question about using custom properties with the single send api. Is there a way to reference `{{custom.variable}}` in the visual drag and drop email builder?
I don’t want to use `{{custom.variable}}` directly in the modules, but pass such variables to modules in emails we build. I can do this when coding up templates, but is there some way to pass them down to modules when using the dnd email editor?

Thanks!

I’ve finally published an article on how to create a user arrangeable template using custom HTML modules.

Please comment if anything isn’t clear or if you’d like more detail!!

<https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/how-build-user-arrangeable-email-using-custom-html-steven-hambleton>
